title: [Large-scale] Flipped Learning-based English Speaking Motivation Program: Utilizing Simulation/VR

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English communication skills and background knowledge in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Combining VR simulations with flipped learning in a BYOD environment to provide real-life-oriented English speaking training.

learning_goals: Learners can speak continuously in English for over 5 minutes on specialized topics (medical/legal/technical) in a VR simulation environment after 4 weeks.
Learners contribute to discussions and presentations with over 80% engagement by utilizing flipped learning materials in weekly formative assessments.
Learners demonstrate a 30% or higher increase in English speaking motivation scores in post-course surveys compared to pre-assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
